name: US police Robot Eagle
description:
Earth is under attack by the futuristic robot war. Be the super power of real steel robot eagle game that you have never seen in any world. Convert into the flying robot eagle. Let the superhero fighting begins with the enemy flying autobot. Be the real steel hero. Reconvert yourself to the real US police robot into the flying eagle. This beast flying hero simulator is the most powerful fiction action game with amazing 3D graphics.
Be the futuristic real steel flying hero and battle against the other futuristic drone, autobot, decepticons to save the Earth. The flying autobot and police simulator is up now. Be the part of this futuristic robot war.

Mission is to face the flying hero games and be the air police robot battle hero. You have unlimited bullets to start the drone battle. The flying eagle is ready for the combat attack. The ultimate futuristic robot flying hero is ready for the real steel US police robot fighting.
The autobot flying game is all set for the drone war.

This game is not only for the youngster but the children can also play the futuristic drone war and enjoy the fighting missions of flying hero game. Full of adventurous immortal legends will give you so much thrill and its dangerous action flying superhero police stunts make you feel like playing the real steel eagle robot action game.

It is the time to show the flying hero action stunt in the fighting arena. Experience yourself that how strong and extra-ordinary are the flying superhero police in which they can convert themselves into the flying eagle anytime it needs. You are the real steel autobot and show your rivals that who is the real steel flying futuristic superhero.
You are the super flying hero of this flying superhero game and be brave in facing the
other furious decepticons and destroy them and destroy them with unlimited bullet.

Complete the target within the time limit and reach for the next mission and start the eagle fighting. Be the real steel hero robot and kill all the evil lord enemies. You are the only one that has the super power of the super flying to start the futuristic war. Become the ultimate battle hero in this futuristic eagle simulator.
So here it is the super-sonic flying eagle police game, enjoy the game of the real police cop flying eagle simulator. Alert yourself when your energy level decreases as you will lose the mission of the air police robot fighting.

Get ready for the futuristic drone war. Be an ultimate super flying eagle. Start the futuristic battle to attack city that is full of tanks, helicopters, drones, ships and different cars. Destroy all the decepticons bases through your super power like flying hero. Start the destruction with other autobots and flying hero. This is the chance to start the steel hero battle against all the super power to destroy them completely and save the city from further futuristic war.

******How to Play The Game******
Tap to start the game
Select the level from the level selection menu
Select your favorite autobots.
Start the flying game to accomplish the mission
Use on screen controls to convert from superhero to flying eagle
Complete the target within the specified time
Destroy all the enemies
Use map directions to complete the mission

*********Features**********
3D animated graphics of drone fight
10 thrilling levels
Different enemies to destroy in each level
Time specified game
Missions to accomplish
Easy to handle
Amazing sound system and camera view
Different Dragons, helicopters, drones, ships, tanks to destroy
Convert from US police inspector to flying eagle
